Class GameOfLife

java.lang.Object
  GameOfLife

public class GameOfLife
extends java.lang.Object

Game of Life starter code. Demonstrates how to create and populate the game using the GridWorld framework. Also demonstrates how to provide accessor methods to make the class testable by unit tests.

Version:
18 July 2014
Author:
@gcschmit
